item.title: ESP8266 ESP3232 Home Assistant Switch Connected to PCF8574 Controlling 8 AC Relays
item.description: Home Assistant Switch for 8 Relays: PCF8574 can be used to extend the GPIO of ESP8266/32 and here we use 8 ports of PCF8574 to control 8 Relay module GitHub: debsahu/PCF8574_8Relay Home Assistant Switch for 8 Relays Code can compile on ESP8266/32 PCF8574 can be used to extend the GPIO of ESP8266/32 8 ports of PCF8574 is connected to 8 Relay module Libraries Needed platformio.
